text: Beautiful store. Stocked up on a variety of rooibos-based blends (due to caffeine sensitivity) and delighted in the range they had. Despite the late hour at night (around 11pm), the gentleman behind the counter was engaged, patient, helpful, courteous. Minimal waiting time for service. The macarons and chocolates looked delicious too!

Small pop up store and my gate A19, but I go opposite direction to looking for this brand lucky . Their smell really good I choose black tea signature . Queen tea and midnight tea expensive but as a traveller willing to spend money for their own brand. Love their local brand

One of the best known Singapore brands by Ron Simâ€™s V3.

TWG Tea is a Singaporean luxury teahouse chain and a namesake brand of artisanal tea. The brand was established in 2008 as a subsidiary of the Singaporean lifestyle company, The Wellness Group - from which the acronym, TWG, was derived.

In 2014, Osim International, itself a subsidiary of the V3 Group, acquired a majority stake in TWG Tea. The company sells over 1,000 blends of tea in its more than 70 boutiques and salons in Asia, Europe, the Middle East, and North America. It also distributes its tea to international retailers.

Beautiful, quaint tea shop with an incredible array of teas on display. The staff were very helpful, asking me questions about the kind of tea tastes and scents I liked and suggested a few blends. Their suggestions were all so amazing - I wanted to take them all. A wee bit pricey, but the brews are amazing. They also have some cute tea pots and sets, as well as traditional china tea sets

TWG tea shop in the Airport has a lot of nice gifts it is beautifully designed and organized with friendly staff and quick service.  I Photos have the prices and the items for sale

If you or a consumer or the owner end like this review you could say thank by following me on Google reviews.
Have The best day ever.  ..
